biography.bio: Bruni Löbel was born on December 20, 1920 in Chemnitz, Germany as Brunhilde Melitta Löbel. She was an actress, known for Une famille en Bavière (1989), Polizeiinspektion 1 (1977) and The Big Lift (1950). She was married to Holger Hagen and Gerhard Bronner. She died on September 27, 2006 in Mühldorf am Inn, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Bruni Löbel

biography.bio: Holger Hagen was born on August 27, 1915 in Halle (Saale), Germany. He is known for his work on Das Fräulein an der Kasse (1964), La famille Trapp en Amérique (1958) and Gesellschaftsspiel (1966). He was married to Bruni Löbel. He died on November 16, 1996 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Holger Hagen

biography.bio: Gisela Fackeldey was born on November 13, 1920 in Cologne, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. She was an actress, known for The Bitter Tears of Petra von Kant (1972), Martha (1974) and Wetterleuchten am Dachstein (1953). She died on October 21, 1986 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Gisela Fackeldey

biography.bio: Heinz Peter Scholz was born on August 3, 1916 in Königsberg, East Prussia, Germany. He was an actor, known for Kollege Bindelmann (1969), Nu parmi les loups (1963) and Erster Klasse (1955). He died in August 1992 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Heinz Peter Scholz

biography.bio: Kurt Pratsch-Kaufmann was born on September 1, 1906 in Dresden, Germany. He was an actor, known for Johannes and the 13 Beauty Queens (1951), Thérèse Raquin (1966) and Großer Ring mit Außenschleife (1966). He was married to Marianne Pohlenz. He died on June 24, 1988 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Kurt Pratsch-Kaufmann

biography.bio: Katrin Schaake was born on November 13, 1931 in Hamburg, Germany. She is known for her work on The Bitter Tears of Petra von Kant (1972), L'amour est plus froid que la mort (1969) and Quoi de neuf, Pussycat? (1965).
biography.name: Katrin Schaake

biography.bio: Ursula Heyer was born on February 15, 1940. She is an actress, known for Hinter den sieben Gleisen (1959), Verbotene Liebe (1995) and Der doppelte Nötzli (1990). She is married to Rainer Brandt.
biography.name: Ursula Heyer

biography.placeOfBirth: Free City of Danzig [now Gdansk, Pomorskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Käte Jaenicke was born on March 22, 1928 in Free City of Danzig. She was an actress, known for The Tin Drum (1979), Angry Harvest (1985) and Seraphine oder Die wundersame Geschichte der Tante Flora (1965). She died on November 1, 2002 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Käte Jaenicke
